Question
========
Which is the best description of the standard deviation SD?

Answerlist
----------
* The SD measures the percentage of the observations that differ from the
  mean.
* The SD measures the difference between the mean and the variance of the
  distribution.
* The SD is defined by the mean difference from the mean.
* The SD is the number of observations that differ from the normal
  distribution.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
